titleStmt.title: SII 12.172: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 172. (A.R. No. 107 of 1934-35). ON THE SAME WALL (LEFT OF ENTRANCE).

summary.p: This is a damaged inscription dated in the 11th year. It registers an order of Śōḻakōṉ exempting from taxes certain lands presented, after purchase, in Pirāntakanallūr, the southern hamlet of Perumbaṟṟappuliyūr as tiruppāvāḍaippuṟam by two ladies, for providing offerings to the goddess Tirukkāmakōṭṭamuḍaiya-Periyanāchchiyār. The lands were left in charge of Tiruchchiṟṟambalamuḍaiyāṉ of Paṉaiyūr who undertook to measure out annually 360 kalam of paddy to the temple.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīAvaṉiyĀḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 1vatu coḻakoṉ Olai . jayatuṅkappalla varaiyarum
tillaiAmpalapala ṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarakaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum
koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tanta tāvatu . tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyār r Aṭiya piḷḷaiyāḻvi ciṟṟiṭai
Arivaiyum Iṟaṅka cciyum tiruppāvaṭaippuṟat tirunāmattukkāṇiyākap perumpaṟṟappuliyūrt teṉpiṭākai pūkalokamāṇikka nā lūrāṉa śrīpirāntakanallūril
Aṉṉiyanāmattāl ṇṭu Iṉnilattāl vanta maṭaṅkukaḷukku tiruvaraṅkukaḷu maṭaviyañcaṉamum maṭaAriciyum Uḷḷiṭṭa koyil ku ya maṭaṅkuṭiyil va ttam
virivil varukiṟa maiyum tevaiyum patiṉoṉṟāvatu nāḷa mutal tavintu Ivvūril civanāmattāl Iṟu ttuṭaṉe kūṭṭikoḷḷakkaṭavatāka yār Eḻutiṉa ni
yokappaṭi nilattu sādhaṉappaṭi I lūril pala nilaṅkaḷilum kaṇṭavācciyaṉ caṅkaraṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ pakkal vilai koṇṭa pañcavaṉ
mātevi vatikku me ḷantira ciṅkaṉ va ñcāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mutalcatirattum Iraṇṭāñcatirattum Uḻaiccāṇaṉ tevaṉ tirunaṭṭamāṭi nilattukku Attipuliyūrppiḷḷai
yār ṉilattukkuk kiḻakku maturāntakapperāṟṟukkut � rar nilattukku meṟkum cammātavāykkālukkut teṟkum palavaravai ṭaiyār nilattukku meṟkum vaikūr Oṭaikku vaṭakkum
naṭuvuḷpaṭṭa Āṇṭati ruṭaiya nilam Arai yaṇa vati vāykkālāka kaṇṇāṟṟu Iraṇṭāñcatirattum muṉṟāñcatirattum ṉ Iḷaiyakūttaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ nila
ttukkuk kiḻakkum yāva kkut teṟkum palavaravaikkum lattukku meṟku kūr Oṭaikku vaṭakkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa velippo ṉṟu peruṭaiya nilattukku meṟkaṭaiya nila
mā nikki nilam kavum In � nilattukkuk kiḻakkum ciyāruṭaiyāṉum tirunaṭṭa kkut teṟkum Aḷappaṉ Āḷkkoṇṭāṉ nilattukku
meṟkum vaiykūr Oṭaikku vaṭakkum naṭuvuḷppaṭa nakkaṉeṉṟu peruṭaiya nilam Araiyum Ikka ticai cattu kiḻakkum vācciyaṉ ve ttaṉ tirucciṟṟampa
lamuṭaiyāṉ nilattukkut teṟkum vācciyaṉ tirunaṭṭapperumāṉ nilat tukku meṟkum vaiykūr Oṭaikku vaṭakku naṭuvuṭppaṭṭa neṟkuppai Eṉṟu peruṭaiya nilamu k kuḷattile
tavum Uṭpaṭa nilam Āṟumāvaraiyum vācciyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ kaṉakasabhāpati pakkal vilaikoṇṭa Ivvūril Ivvāykkāl Aiñcāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāñcatirattum Āṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mutaṟcatirattu
m kiṭāraṅkoṇṭa coḻappiramārāyaṉ tirunaṭṭapperumāḷ nilattukku karup pūrppiḷḷaiyāṉ nilattukku meṟkum vaiykūr Oṭaikku vaṭakku naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa māmpaṭṭu Eṉṟu pe ruṭaiya nilam
Eṭṭu māvum vācciyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamu ykkāl muṉṟāṅkaṇṉāṟṟu muṉṟāñcatirattu viṟkiṉṟār Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukku kiḻakkum ci parāntakapperāṟṟukku meṟkum Ātaṉuruṭai
yā rakara nilattukku meṟkkum perariyātār nilattukku vaṭakkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa melaittoṭṭa meṉṟu peruṭaiya nilam nālumāvum Aiñcāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu Iraṇṭāñcatirattu meṟka ṭaiya nilattukkuk kiḻakkum
kempiranampiyār Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukkut teṟkum Atti viṇṇa ttārum
Eṭṭu māvum Āka nilam muṉṟe Iraṇṭumāvum Eḻutiṉa Iṉ nilattāl maṭakku nilam kkāṇikkiḻ mummāva
yenāṉmāvaraikku maṭakkilum virivilum koḷḷum kaṭamai kuṭimaiyun tavirttu paruṣaiyār Eḻutiṉa niyokamum tirukkaioṭṭip paṇṭārattile Oṭukkavum Innilattukku Ū riḷaṅkālāl
muṉṉūṟṟu Aṟupatiṉkalap poṉakappaḻanellu Etirāmāṇṭu mutal Āṇṭutoṟum tillai nāyakaṉ perumpaṇṭārattile paṉaiyūruṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ Aḷa
kka kaṭavaṉākavum Ippaṭiye tirumāḷikaiyile kalveṭṭakkaṭavatākap paṇṇuvate Ivai coḻa koṉ Eḻutteṉṟu pukunta Evaṟtiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 12.172 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
